p.span: Información sobre rutas de distribución de almuerzos

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

a.style: text-decoration-line: none;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

a.span: Click here to go to information for the Online Instructional Website

a.style: text-decoration-line: none;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

a.span: Haga clic aquí para ir a la información del sitio web de instrucción en línea

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Many students will be accessing information provided to them by teachers from email, Google Classroom, or Seesaw

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

em.span: Muchos estudiantes accederán a la información que les proporcionan los maestros por correo electrónico, Google Classroom o Seesaw

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: All support is available from 8:00 am to 3:00 pm Monday through Friday.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We will do our best to respond to needs, but due to the unique environment of home support, there may be times where we can not resolve home-specific support requests.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Todo el soporte es de 8:00 am a 3:00 pm de lunes a viernes.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Haremos nuestro mejor esfuerzo para responder a las necesidades, pero debido al ambiente único de ayuda a domicilio, puede haber ocasiones eran no podemos resolver las solicitudes de apoyo en el hogar específicos.

br.div: If you are in need of a replacement device, or a chromebook for your home to support OID, then you can come to the Copeland Middle School on Monday from 11am to 1pm, and a Technician will be on site to provide you with a device. Please observe social distancing guidelines allowing for 6 feet of space between you and others, when arriving to the school (especially if a line is forming to pick up devices).

Si necesita un dispositivo de reemplazo o un Chromebook de manera que su hogar tenga opción para OID, puede venir a la Escuela Intermedia Copeland los martes y jueves de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m., y un técnico estará en el lugar para proporcionarle un Chromebook. Tenga en cuenta las pautas de distanciamiento social que permiten 6 'de espacio entre usted y los demás, al llegar a la escuela.(especialmente si se está formando una fila para recoger Chromebooks).

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

a.style: text-decoration-line: none;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

a.style: text-decoration-line: none;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

br.p: Below is information provided by highspeedinternet.com on how you can get access to internet at your home if you are in need. As it mentions, please be aware that not all services are available in all areas, and all connections will be subject to some limitations on service availability.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

div.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 35px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

h2.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 0.5rem; padding: 0px; font-weight: 500; color: inherit; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; line-height: 1.3; font-size: 2.25rem;

div.h2: Can I get no-cost internet during the COVID-19 outbreak?

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

div.p: You can get no-cost, in-home internet for up to two months during the new coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak if you qualify for certain low-income internet programs or have a student living in your household. Here’s a list of the internet providers offering limited, no-cost internet services during the outbreak.

div.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

tr.td: Internet up to 15 Mbps through Connect2Compete program

td.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 15px; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(214, 214, 214);

tr.td:
New Cox customers with at least one K–12 student in household
who qualifies for public assistance programs

td.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 15px; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(214, 214, 214);

tr.td:
No cost for first 30 days
($9.95/mo. after)

td.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 15px; border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(214, 214, 214);

a.style: box-sizing: border-box; box-shadow: none; border-bottom: none; text-decoration-line: none; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; background-color: transparent; line-height: inherit; color: rgb(7, 166, 205); cursor: pointer;

div.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;
box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 35px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 0px; font-size: 10pt;
span.em: Data effective 3/18/20. Not all offers available in all areas. Prices and packages are subject to change.

p.style: color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: inherit; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

div.p: Every internet provider that has signed the Keep Americans Connected Pledge has also opened up their Wi-Fi hotspots for free public use.

p.style: color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: inherit; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;
box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

font.face: Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

span.style: font-size: 16px;

p.style: color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: inherit; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: inherit; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

p.span: A continuación encontrará información proporcionada por highspeedinternet.com sobre cómo puede obtener acceso a Internet en su hogar si lo necesita. Como se menciona, tenga en cuenta que no todos los servicios están disponibles en todas las áreas, y todas las conexiones estarán sujetas a algunas limitaciones en la disponibilidad del servicio.

p.style: color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: inherit; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

div.style: color: rgb(14, 56, 81); font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 35px; padding: 0px;

h2.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 0.5rem; padding: 0px; font-weight: 500; color: inherit; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; line-height: 1.3; font-size: 2.25rem;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 0px;

h2.span: Puedo obtener internet sin costo durante el brote de COVID-19?

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: inherit; line-height: 1.5; text-rendering: optimizelegibility;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box;

p.span: Puede obtener Internet sin costo en el hogar por hasta dos meses durante el nuevo brote de coronavirus (COVID-19) si califica para ciertos programas de internet de bajos ingresos o si un estudiante vive en su hogar.

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin-bottom: 0px;

p.span: Aquí hay una lista de los proveedores de internet que ofrecen servicios de internet limitados y sin costo durante el brote.

p.span: Todos los proveedores de Internet que han firmado el compromiso de Keep Americans Connected también han abierto sus puntos de acceso Wi-Fi para uso público gratuito.

div.br:
P.O. Box 500, 16 School Road
Hibernia, NJ 07842
